oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leather coin purse and copper one-cent coin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Leather fold-over coin purse and United States matron head one-cent coin. The purse is tattered, and has a distinct imprint from the coin. The back of the coin has been polished smooth. There is a square hole punched in the 9 o'clock position. It is possible that the coin was intended to be used as an identification tag.
